entry.def: A turntable is the flat, round part of a record player on which a record is put when it is played.

means.word_mean: 1. a circular horizontal platform that rotates a phonograph record while it is being played
2. a revolving tray placed on a dining table
3. a rotatable platform with a track; used to turn locomotives and cars
